theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on the conserved IIS pathway regulating lifespan via metabolism, stress resistance, and FOXO transcription factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway regulation of aging and stress resistance through DAF-16/FOXO and cytoplasmic LSm proteins, fitting IIS signaling mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS over-stimulation effects and FOXO regulation linking IIS to age-related diseases, fitting IIS pathway theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes conserved IGF-1 signaling network regulating lifespan and stress resistance, consistent with IIS pathway mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details IIS pathway genes and transcription factors mediating lifespan regulation, fitting IIS signaling subcluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on nutrient sensing and functional diversification of insulin-like peptides in IIS pathway regulating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights brain-specific IGF1R levels modulating lifespan, a tissue-specific aspect of IIS pathway effects on aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS reduction and FOXO activation in specific tissues extending lifespan, fitting IIS pathway mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DAF-16/FOXO regulatory network and co-factors SIR-2.1/SIRT1 and HCF-1 modulating IIS-mediated longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes reduced IIS signaling mutations extending lifespan, consistent with IIS pathway longevity mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IGF1 deficiency and GH receptor mutations extending lifespan, fitting IIS pathway aging regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links germline status to lifespan via DAF-16/FOXO activation, a pathway related to IIS signaling and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Energy Tradeoff Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caloric restriction reducing energy intake to extend lifespan via metabolic and hormonal pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Energy Tradeoff Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes energy allocation tradeoff under caloric restriction favoring somatic maintenance and repair.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Energy Tradeoff Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes adaptive dual regulatory systems modulated by energy availability, linking CR to longevity pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Energy Tradeoff Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes calorie restriction enhancing oxidative metabolism in yeast, a metabolic mechanism of CR-induced lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Energy Tradeoff Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links food restriction to resource allocation shifts favoring maintenance over reproduction, consistent with CR and disposable soma.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates behavioral traits with life-history trade-offs affecting reproduction, immunity, and survival.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic disposable soma theory emphasizing trade-off between somatic maintenance and reproduction shaped by extrinsic mortality.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on resource allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains senescence via resource allocation trade-offs affecting somatic durability linked to reproductive value.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Contrasts reproductive restraint and terminal investment strategies as adaptive life-history trade-offs influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Meta-analysis of reproduction-survival trade-offs, emphasizing life-history resource allocation constraints.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes evolutionary optimization of resource allocation between maintenance and reproduction causing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Disposable soma hypothesis applied to sexual selection and senescence, emphasizing trade-offs in somatic repair.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on soma/germline distinction and resource allocation trade-offs explaining menopause and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life History and Reproductive Trade-Off Theories of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Cost of reproduction theory linking reproductive effort to accelerated cellular aging and senescence.
